mapper.insert: insert into spring_users (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_tel) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel})
mapper.update: update spring_users set user_password = #{password}, user_tel = #{tel}, user_photo = #{photo}, user_deleted = #{deleted}, user_updated_date = sysdate where user_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select user_id as id, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_email as email, user_tel as tel, user_photo as photo, user_deleted as deleted, user_updated_date as updatedDate, user_created_date as createdDate from spring_users where user_id = #{value}
